titel.next1Text: You SCREAM. From the bottom of your lungs. A gutteral growl

choices.choiceText1: Scream HELLO IS ANYONE THERE!? as loud as you can
choices.choiceText3: Tell yourself that you need a drink
choices.choiceText4: Reminiscent of how you embarresed yourself years ago

story.storyText: You wake up in your own sweat, piss and puke. You slowly try to sit up but the whole room is spinning. As you do a pathetic attempt at sitting straight, you fall over onto the floor. You disgust yourself.

titel.next1Text: You SCREAM. From the bottom of your lungs. A gutteral growl

choices.choiceText1: Beg your neighbor to come and save you
choices.choiceText2: Tell your neighbor to eat ass
choices.choiceText3: Decide to search your apartment for a gun
choices.choiceText4: Start making plans - for world domination

story.storyText: As you scream from the top of your lungs - IS ANYONE THERE!? You hear the neightbot telling you to shut up.
